name: Artificial Stupidity (NicolasDreams)
description:
You are a human and you made a pathfinding AI. But it's in a early development stage. Right now the AI only can walk in a straight line to you. Can you help the AI to beat some tests?

Controls:

-Move human -> WASD or ARROW KEYS

-Move AI -> hold SPACE or ENTER

-Restart level -> R

-Quit game -> ESC (or ALT + F4 if you are a nerd)
